poster: T I L T B O I
title: Why are you rewarded for being terrible on nasus?
body:
i'm literally getting 3 shot by a guy with 30 cs per 10, and 100 or less stacks per 10 and his wither cool down is the same as the duration of the spell so i can't do anything.

really cool design i know the champion needs to be playable at all elos but this is a joke
